Reason: The configuration option _journalAgeThreshold is performance-sensitive. This is because the _journalAgeThreshold parameter is directly used in the creation of a PersistentJournal object within the journal() method. The value of _journalAgeThreshold directly affects the behavior of the PersistentJournal, which can have a significant impact on system performance. Therefore, any changes to _journalAgeThreshold can lead to notable performance variations at the system level.
